style.description: The Maple is a popular fence design, with no-sag, and looks the same on both sides.
The Classic is the easiest fence to build and most economical, with boards on one side, no-sag, and rails on edge.
The Executive is the strongest, built with no-sag , three rails and a 2x6 cap to finish of the top.
The Luxton is a classic fence that is simple to build, with no-sag and three rails across one side.
